title: Slack Web API
description: One way to interact with the Slack platform is its HTTP RPC-based Web API, a collection of methods requiring OAuth 2.0-based user, bot, or workspace tokens blessed with related OAuth scopes.

admin_users_session_reset.title: admin_users_session_reset
admin_users_session_reset.description: Wipes all valid sessions on all devices for a given user

apps_permissions_info.title: apps_permissions_info
apps_permissions_info.description: Returns list of permissions this app has on a team.

apps_permissions_request.title: apps_permissions_request
apps_permissions_request.description: Allows an app to request additional scopes

apps_permissions_resources_list.title: apps_permissions_resources_list
apps_permissions_resources_list.description: Returns list of resource grants this app has on a team.

apps_permissions_scopes_list.title: apps_permissions_scopes_list
apps_permissions_scopes_list.description: Returns list of scopes this app has on a team.

apps_permissions_users_list.title: apps_permissions_users_list
apps_permissions_users_list.description: Returns list of user grants and corresponding scopes this app has on a team.

apps_permissions_users_request.title: apps_permissions_users_request
apps_permissions_users_request.description: Enables an app to trigger a permissions modal to grant an app access to a user access scope.

apps_uninstall.title: apps_uninstall
apps_uninstall.description: Uninstalls your app from a workspace.

bots_info.title: bots_info
bots_info.description: Gets information about a bot user.

channels_history.title: channels_history
channels_history.description: Fetches history of messages and events from a channel.

channels_invite.title: channels_invite
channels_invite.description: Invites a user to a channel.

channels_join.title: channels_join
channels_join.description: Joins a channel, creating it if needed.

channels_kick.title: channels_kick
channels_kick.description: Removes a user from a channel.

channels_list.title: channels_list
channels_list.description: Lists all channels in a Slack team.

channels_mark.title: channels_mark
channels_mark.description: Sets the read cursor in a channel.

channels_replies.title: channels_replies
channels_replies.description: Retrieve a thread of messages posted to a channel

channels_setPurpose.title: channels_setPurpose
channels_setPurpose.description: Sets the purpose for a channel.

channels_setTopic.title: channels_setTopic
channels_setTopic.description: Sets the topic for a channel.

chat_deleteScheduledMessage.title: chat_deleteScheduledMessage
chat_deleteScheduledMessage.description: Deletes a pending scheduled message from the queue.

chat_getPermalink.title: chat_getPermalink
chat_getPermalink.description: Retrieve a permalink URL for a specific extant message

chat_meMessage.title: chat_meMessage
chat_meMessage.description: Share a me message into a channel.

chat_postEphemeral.title: chat_postEphemeral
chat_postEphemeral.description: Sends an ephemeral message to a user in a channel.

chat_postMessage.title: chat_postMessage
chat_postMessage.description: Sends a message to a channel.

chat_scheduleMessage.title: chat_scheduleMessage
chat_scheduleMessage.description: Schedules a message to be sent to a channel.

chat_scheduledMessages_list.title: chat_scheduledMessages_list
chat_scheduledMessages_list.description: Returns a list of scheduled messages.

chat_unfurl.title: chat_unfurl
chat_unfurl.description: Provide custom unfurl behavior for user-posted URLs

conversations_close.title: conversations_close
conversations_close.description: Closes a direct message or multi-person direct message.

conversations_create.title: conversations_create
conversations_create.description: Initiates a public or private channel-based conversation

conversations_history.title: conversations_history
conversations_history.description: Fetches a conversation's history of messages and events.

conversations_kick.title: conversations_kick
conversations_kick.description: Removes a user from a conversation.

conversations_list.title: conversations_list
conversations_list.description: Lists all channels in a Slack team.

conversations_open.title: conversations_open
conversations_open.description: Opens or resumes a direct message or multi-person direct message.

conversations_replies.title: conversations_replies
conversations_replies.description: Retrieve a thread of messages posted to a conversation

conversations_setPurpose.title: conversations_setPurpose
conversations_setPurpose.description: Sets the purpose for a conversation.

conversations_setTopic.title: conversations_setTopic
conversations_setTopic.description: Sets the topic for a conversation.

dialog_open.title: dialog_open
dialog_open.description: Open a dialog with a user

dnd_endDnd.title: dnd_endDnd
dnd_endDnd.description: Ends the current user's Do Not Disturb session immediately.

dnd_endSnooze.title: dnd_endSnooze
dnd_endSnooze.description: Ends the current user's snooze mode immediately.

dnd_info.title: dnd_info
dnd_info.description: Retrieves a user's current Do Not Disturb status.

dnd_setSnooze.title: dnd_setSnooze
dnd_setSnooze.description: Turns on Do Not Disturb mode for the current user, or changes its duration.

dnd_teamInfo.title: dnd_teamInfo
dnd_teamInfo.description: Retrieves the Do Not Disturb status for up to 50 users on a team.

emoji_list.title: emoji_list
emoji_list.description: Lists custom emoji for a team.

files_comments_delete.title: files_comments_delete
files_comments_delete.description: Deletes an existing comment on a file.

files_info.title: files_info
files_info.description: Gets information about a team file.

files_revokePublicURL.title: files_revokePublicURL
files_revokePublicURL.description: Revokes public/external sharing access for a file

files_sharedPublicURL.title: files_sharedPublicURL
files_sharedPublicURL.description: Enables a file for public/external sharing.

groups_createChild.title: groups_createChild
groups_createChild.description: Clones and archives a private channel.

groups_history.title: groups_history
groups_history.description: Fetches history of messages and events from a private channel.

groups_info.title: groups_info
groups_info.description: Gets information about a private channel.

groups_invite.title: groups_invite
groups_invite.description: Invites a user to a private channel.

groups_kick.title: groups_kick
groups_kick.description: Removes a user from a private channel.

groups_list.title: groups_list
groups_list.description: Lists private channels that the calling user has access to.

groups_mark.title: groups_mark
groups_mark.description: Sets the read cursor in a private channel.

groups_replies.title: groups_replies
groups_replies.description: Retrieve a thread of messages posted to a private channel

groups_setPurpose.title: groups_setPurpose
groups_setPurpose.description: Sets the purpose for a private channel.

groups_setTopic.title: groups_setTopic
groups_setTopic.description: Sets the topic for a private channel.

im_history.title: im_history
im_history.description: Fetches history of messages and events from direct message channel.

im_list.title: im_list
im_list.description: Lists direct message channels for the calling user.

im_mark.title: im_mark
im_mark.description: Sets the read cursor in a direct message channel.

im_replies.title: im_replies
im_replies.description: Retrieve a thread of messages posted to a direct message conversation

migration_exchange.title: migration_exchange
migration_exchange.description: For Enterprise Grid workspaces, map local user IDs to global user IDs

mpim_close.title: mpim_close
mpim_close.description: Closes a multiparty direct message channel.

mpim_history.title: mpim_history
mpim_history.description: Fetches history of messages and events from a multiparty direct message.

mpim_list.title: mpim_list
mpim_list.description: Lists multiparty direct message channels for the calling user.

mpim_mark.title: mpim_mark
mpim_mark.description: Sets the read cursor in a multiparty direct message channel.

mpim_open.title: mpim_open
mpim_open.description: This method opens a multiparty direct message.

mpim_replies.title: mpim_replies
mpim_replies.description: Retrieve a thread of messages posted to a direct message conversation from a multiparty direct message.

oauth_access.title: oauth_access
oauth_access.description: Exchanges a temporary OAuth verifier code for an access token.

oauth_token.title: oauth_token
oauth_token.description: Exchanges a temporary OAuth verifier code for a workspace token.

pins_add.title: pins_add
pins_add.description: Pins an item to a channel.

pins_list.title: pins_list
pins_list.description: Lists items pinned to a channel.

pins_remove.title: pins_remove
pins_remove.description: Un-pins an item from a channel.

reactions_add.title: reactions_add
reactions_add.description: Adds a reaction to an item.

reactions_list.title: reactions_list
reactions_list.description: Lists reactions made by a user.

reactions_remove.title: reactions_remove
reactions_remove.description: Removes a reaction from an item.

reminders_list.title: reminders_list
reminders_list.description: Lists all reminders created by or for a given user.

rtm_connect.title: rtm_connect
rtm_connect.description: Starts a Real Time Messaging session.

search_messages.title: search_messages
search_messages.description: Searches for messages matching a query.

stars_add.title: stars_add
stars_add.description: Adds a star to an item.

stars_remove.title: stars_remove
stars_remove.description: Removes a star from an item.

team_accessLogs.title: team_accessLogs
team_accessLogs.description: Gets the access logs for the current team.

team_billableInfo.title: team_billableInfo
team_billableInfo.description: Gets billable users information for the current team.

team_info.title: team_info
team_info.description: Gets information about the current team.

team_integrationLogs.title: team_integrationLogs
team_integrationLogs.description: Gets the integration logs for the current team.

usergroups_list.title: usergroups_list
usergroups_list.description: List all User Groups for a team

usergroups_users_list.title: usergroups_users_list
usergroups_users_list.description: List all users in a User Group

usergroups_users_update.title: usergroups_users_update
usergroups_users_update.description: Update the list of users for a User Group

users_conversations.title: users_conversations
users_conversations.description: List conversations the calling user may access.

users_list.title: users_list
users_list.description: Lists all users in a Slack team.

users_lookupByEmail.title: users_lookupByEmail
users_lookupByEmail.description: Find a user with an email address.

users_profile_set.title: users_profile_set
users_profile_set.description: Set the profile information for a user.

users_setActive.title: users_setActive
users_setActive.description: Marked a user as active. Deprecated and non-functional.
